00020 #ifndef VARIABLEORDERS_H
00021 #define VARIABLEORDERS_H
00022 
00023 #include "search_methods.h"
00024 
00025 template<typename T>
00026 void inline maybe_print_search_assignment(StateObj* stateObj, T& var, DomainInt val, BOOL equal, bool force = false)
00027 {
00028     if(getOptions(stateObj).dumptree)
00029     {
00030       if(force)
00031         cout << "ForceAssign: " << var << (equal?" = ":" != ") << val << endl;
00032       else
00033         cout << "SearchAssign:" << var << (equal?" = ":" != ") << val << endl;
00034     }
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<typename VarType = AnyVarRef, typename BranchType = StaticBranch>
00038 struct VariableOrder
00039 {
00040   StateObj* stateObj;
00041   vector<VarType> var_order;
00042   vector<int> val_order;
00043   vector<int> branches;
00044   vector<int> first_unassigned_variable;
00045   unsigned pos;
00046   
00047   BranchType branch_method;
00048   
00049   
00050   VariableOrder(StateObj* _stateObj, vector<VarType>& _varorder, vector<int>& _valorder)
00051   : stateObj(_stateObj), var_order(_varorder), val_order(_valorder)
00052   {
00053     // if this isn't enough room, the vector will autoresize. While that can be slow,
00054     // it only has to happen at most the log of the maximum search depth.
00055     branches.reserve(var_order.size());
00056     first_unassigned_variable.reserve(var_order.size());
00057     pos = 0; 
00058   }
00059   
00060   void reset()
00061   {
00062     branches.clear();
00063     first_unassigned_variable.clear();
00064     pos = 0;
00065   }
00066       
00067   // Returns true if all variables assigned
00068   bool find_next_unassigned()
00069   {
00070     pos = branch_method(var_order, pos);
00071     return pos == var_order.size();
00072   }
00073   
00074   bool finished_search()
00075   { return branches.size() == 0; }
00076   
00077   int search_depth()
00078   { return branches.size(); }
00079   
00080   void branch_left()
00081   {
00082     D_ASSERT(!var_order[pos].isAssigned()) 
00083     DomainInt assign_val;
00084     if(val_order[pos])
00085       assign_val = var_order[pos].getMin();
00086     else
00087       assign_val = var_order[pos].getMax();
00088     var_order[pos].decisionAssign(assign_val);
00089     maybe_print_search_assignment(stateObj, var_order[pos], assign_val, true);
00090     branches.push_back(pos);
00091     first_unassigned_variable.push_back(pos);
00092   }
00093   
00094   int get_current_pos()
00095   { return pos; }
00096   
00097   void force_branch_left(int new_pos)
00098   {
00099     D_ASSERT(new_pos >= 0 && new_pos < var_order.size()); 
00100     D_ASSERT(!var_order[new_pos].isAssigned()) 
00101     DomainInt assign_val;
00102     if(val_order[new_pos])
00103       assign_val = var_order[new_pos].getMin();
00104     else
00105       assign_val = var_order[new_pos].getMax();
00106     var_order[new_pos].uncheckedAssign(assign_val);
00107     maybe_print_search_assignment(stateObj, var_order[new_pos], assign_val, true, true);
00108     branches.push_back(new_pos);
00109     // The first unassigned variable could still be much earlier.
00110     first_unassigned_variable.push_back(pos);
00111   }
00112   
00113   void branch_right()
00114   {  
00115      int other_branch = branches.back();
00116      branches.pop_back();
00117     
00118      if(val_order[other_branch])
00119      {
00120        D_ASSERT(var_order[other_branch].getMax() >= var_order[other_branch].getMin() + 1);
00121        maybe_print_search_assignment(stateObj, var_order[other_branch], var_order[other_branch].getMin(), false);
00122        var_order[other_branch].setMin(var_order[other_branch].getMin() + 1);
00123      }
00124      else
00125      {
00126        D_ASSERT(var_order[other_branch].getMax() >= var_order[other_branch].getMin() + 1);
00127        maybe_print_search_assignment(stateObj, var_order[other_branch], var_order[other_branch].getMax(), false);
00128        var_order[other_branch].setMax(var_order[other_branch].getMax() - 1);
00129      }
00130     
00131     pos = first_unassigned_variable.back();
00132     first_unassigned_variable.pop_back();
00133   }
00134 };
00135 
00136 #endif
